    • isGreekText

      public static boolean isGreekText(String form)
      Parameters:
      form - the word
      Returns:
      true if the normalized form without the diacritics is between PERISPOMENI and YOT, the unicode range for Greek

      Returns:

    • toBetaLowercase

      public static String toBetaLowercase(String beta)
      assumes lower case version of beta, since this is what we search on
      Parameters:
      beta - the input string, with '*'
      Returns:
      a version without breathing or *

    • toBetaUnaccented

      public static String toBetaUnaccented(String beta)
      Gets rid of breathing and upper case symbols. Does not change the case of the characters
      Parameters:
      beta - the input string with breathing and * for capitals
      Returns:
      a version without breathing or *
